name: @moonbeam/moonbeam-models
description: This sub-package represents the common models, to be used across Moonbeam.
author: Marius Acsinte <marius@moonbeam.vet>

scripts.build: rm ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && rm -rf ./lib && ./node_modules/.bin/graphql-codegen && cat appsync.d.ts > ./src/common/GraphqlExports.ts && tsc && rm appsync.d.ts && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/Root.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/StorageSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/MilitaryVerificationSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/CardLinkingSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/TransactionsSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/NotificationsSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/PhysicalDevicesSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/OffersSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/FAQSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/UserAuthSessionSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/NotificationReminderSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/AppUpgradeSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/ReferralSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/LoggingSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/MilitaryVerificationReportingSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/AppReviewSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/UtilitiesSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql && cat ./src/graphql/schemas/ReimbursementsSchema.graphql >> ../getmoonbeam-cdk/graphql/schema.graphql
